Package Library.io

Class ProcessOutputBuffer

java.lang.Object
Library.io.ProcessOutputBuffer
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiscardProcessOutputBuffer
public class ProcessOutputBuffer extends Object
This class represents an output buffer for a process
